issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Parquet data source should support DATE
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4843](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4843). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The new Parquet data source (ARROW-4466) fails with "Unable to convert parquet logical type DATE" when reading some parquet files.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4843?focusedCommentId=16793142) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I ended up doing this in ARROW-4466
